amendment.description: To set aside funding for the ocean agriculture working group.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1121 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6311) To set aside funding for the ocean agriculture working group.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1121 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1121 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Whitehouse to Amendment SA 948.
